BBEX3.M.BMD.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Bermuda * / EUR 1 = BMD ... (middle)
General: Fixed exchange rate to the US dollar.
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Bermuda Commercial Bank Limited, Hamilton for US dollar.

Methodology: * We do not have any data from Bermuda on euro exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the US dollar exchange rate in Bermuda (USD 1 = BMD 1.00015) in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
